摋摋摋

摋字的基本解释

摋
sà
侧手击。
按揉。
抛散。
灭除。
中药炮制法，雷公炮制法之一。

摋
shā
〔弊摋〕杂糅，如“不与物相摋摋。”

摋
shǎi
〔摆摋〕抖擞。

摋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sà］
［《廣韻》桑割切，入曷，心。］
(1)侧手击；打击。
(2)按揉。
(3)散。
(4)消灭。
[②]［shā］
［《集韻》山戛切，入黠，生。］
(1)见“弊3摋”。
(2)同“殺”。参见“抹摋”。
(3)同“煞”。器物名。木楔。

摋字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摋； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页449第09
【唐韻】桑割切【集韻】【韻會】桑葛切，?音薩。側手擊也。【公羊傳·莊十二年】宋萬臂摋仇牧。【註】側手曰摋。一曰抹摋也。【韓愈孟郊墓誌】惟其大翫於辭，而與世抹摋。【註】掃滅也。古通用末殺。　又揮散也。　又【集韻】山戛切，音煞。亦擊也。　又私列切，音薛。義同。　又師駭切，撒上聲。擺摋，抖擻也。　又【字彙補】先結切，音屑。◎按考工記輪人，牙得，則無槷而固。註云：槷，榝也，蜀人言榝曰槷。釋文，素結反，从木，非从手。

摋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
摋字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
sà
Side hand strike.
Knead.
Throw away.
Exterminate.
Chinese medicine processing method, one of the processing methods of Lei Gong.
Squeeze
shā
[Cons] Miscellaneous, such as "Do not squash with things."
Squeeze
shǎi
〔Pendant〕 trembling.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sà］
["Guangyun" Mulberry cuts, enters, heart. ]
(1) Side-hand strike; strike.
(2) Press and knead.
(3) Scattered.
(4) Elimination.
[②]［shā］
["Ji Yun" Shan Jia cuts, enters the key, is born. ]
(1) See "Cons 3".
(2) Same as "killing". See "wipe off".
(3) Same as "sha". The name of the utensil. Wooden wedges.
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　摋; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 449 09
[Tang Yun] Sang cut cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Sang Ge cut,? Yinsa. Side-hand strike also. [The Twelfth Year of Gong Yang Zhuan] Song Wan's arms against Qiu Mu. [Note] The side hand said, pinch. One said to wipe it. [Han Yu and Mengjiao Epitaph] But his great lingering in his death, and wiping away from the world. [Note] Sweep it out. Ancient general end kills.　It's evaporating again.　[Ji Yun] Shan Jiaqie, the sound is evil. Also hit also.　Separately cut again, Yin Xue. The same meaning.　Teacher horrified again, and let out a sound. Swinging, shaking too.　[Word Supplement] First knot and cut, sound scraps. ◎According to Kaogongji, turn people, and Yade, then it will be solid. Note: Nai, Naiya, Shu people say Nai is Nai. Interpretation, the element is the opposite, from the wood, not from the hand.

Squeeze
Name meaning
Nothing.
sà, shā
гл.
1) sà * бить наотмашь (сплеча); шлёпать
臂摋 ударить сплеча (наотмашь)
2) sà * стирать, тереть (рукой)
3) shā * примешиваться; спутываться
弊杀 (biéshā) смешиваться, спутываться
